# promise/no-new-statics <Badge type="info" text="Correctness" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="fix" type="info">
<span class="emoji">üõ†Ô∏è</span> An auto-fix is available for this rule.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Disallow calling new on a Promise static method.

### Why is this bad?

Calling a Promise static method with new is invalid, resulting in a TypeError at runtime.

### Example

```javascript
new Promise.resolve(value);
```
